<script>
			if (tracker.data) {
		var city = tracker.data.city_name,
			category = tracker.data.category,
			platform = 'wap';
	} else {
		var city = tracker.city_name,
			category = tracker.category,
			platform = 'web';
	}

	ga('set', 'dimension1', city);
	ga('set', 'dimension2', category);
	ga('set', 'dimension3', 'Listing_Controller');
	ga('set', 'dimension4', platform);

	(function () {
		var refer = document.referrer;
		if (refer && refer.search("http://") > -1) {
			var domain = refer.match(/:\/\/(.[^/]+)/)[1];
			if (domain.indexOf("baidu.com") > -1) { //暂时只统计baidu，忽略其他份额小的SE。
				ga('set', 'dimension5', 'Listing_Controller');
			}
		}
	})();

	ga('send', 'pageview');

	/** End: Google Analytics */
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
_defer.push(function() {
	var $sticky = $('.media-box-fixed');
	if ($(document).height() > 7000) {
		var _top = $sticky.offset().top - 45;
		var _offset = $('.foot-links-box').offset();
		var _bottom = _offset ? $(document).height() - _offset.top : 20;
		$sticky.affix({
			offset: {
				top: function (){
					// 由于广告是异步加载的，_top的值在加载完成后可能会变大，这里取到这个最后的值做为affix插件的数据
					// 注意：由于affix插件的特性，在变成affix-bottom之后, $sticky.offset().top会被覆盖，这里的判断条件过滤了这种情况
					_top = $sticky.offset().top - 45 > _top && $sticky.hasClass('affix-top') ?$sticky.offset().top - 45: _top;
					return _top;
				},
				bottom: _bottom
			}
		});
	}
});
</script>

<li class="media clearfix adsense adsense-oneline">
	<a class="media-body" target="_blank" href="#{url}" style="text-decoration:none;display:block;" data-act_type="listing-insert" data-hintword="#{hintword}" data-keyword="#{keyword}" data-billing_name="#{billing_name}" data-index="#{index}" data-top="1">
		<div class="media-body-title">
		<span>#{line1}</span>
		</div>
		<div class="media-body-des">#{line2}</div>
		<small class="pull-right">广告</small>
	</a>
</li>

<script type="text/html" id="item_adsense_tmpl">
<li class="media clearfix adsense" id="s_i_ad#{index}">
	<a href="#{url}" target="_blank" class="media-cap" data-act_type="listing-insert" data-hintword="#{hintword}" data-keyword="#{keyword}" data-billing_name="#{billing_name}">
	<img src="#{imgUrl}" alt="#{line1}">
	</a>
	<a class="media-body" target="_blank" href="#{url}" style="text-decoration:none;display:block;" data-act_type="listing-insert" data-hintword="#{hintword}" data-keyword="#{keyword}" data-billing_name="#{billing_name}" data-index="#{index}">
		<div class="media-body-title">
			<small class="adsense-label">广告</small>
			<span>#{line1}</span>
		</div>
		<div class="ad-item-detail">#{line2}</div>
		<div class="ad-item-detail">#{visible_url}</div>
	</a>
</li>
</script>

<script type="text/html" id="table_adsense_tmpl">
<li class="clearfix table-adsense-item table-view-item adsense">
	<a target="_blank" href="#{url}" data-act_type="listing-insert" data-hintword="#{hintword}" data-keyword="#{keyword}" data-billing_name="#{billing_name}" data-index="#{index}">
		<span class="table-view-body">
			#{line1}
		</span>
		<div class="table-view-block">#{line2}</div>
		<div class="table-view-cap">广告</div>
	</a>
</li>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	var totalAds = $('.item-pinned').length + $('.item-regular').length;
	var viewType = 'table';
	var keyword = '招聘咨询师';
	var insertSize2 = 18;
	var insertSize = totalAds > 50 ? 7 : 5; // 当ad不足50条是，每隔5条出一个广告
	var adSize = 5;
	// var divide = +tracker.lastPvId.split('-')[0].substr(-4)%6;
	var divide = 0;
	var showTopItems = 1;
	var hardcodeAds = [
		{
			tit: '一分钟线上申请，低息快速轻松贷款',
			desc: '简单快速搞的定',
			surl: 'jinrong.baixing.com',
			curl: 'http://jinrong.baixing.com/?src=web-listing-insert5',
			imgUrl: '//file.baixing.net/201702/f708b98b10406238858ce05c58813f03.png'
		},
		{
			tit: '节后缺钱怎么办？上百姓金融一分钟申请，半天放款',
			desc: '简单快速搞的定',
			surl: 'jinrong.baixing.com',
			curl: 'http://jinrong.baixing.com/?src=web-listing-insert6',
			imgUrl: '//file.baixing.net/201702/f708b98b10406238858ce05c58813f03.png'
		}
	];

	var cproRenderer = function (_ads) {
		var ads = []

		if (_ads) {
			for(var i = 0; i < _ads.length; i++) {
				if (_ads[i].surl.indexOf('58.com') === -1) {
					ads.push(_ads[i])
				}
			}
		}

		var doubleAds = ads.concat(ads) // 双倍展现
		if (doubleAds.length > 6) {
			doubleAds[6] = hardcodeAds[0]
			doubleAds[7] = hardcodeAds[1]
		} else {
			doubleAds = doubleAds.concat(hardcodeAds)
		}

		$list = viewType == 'item' ? $('.list-ad-items').not('.list-no-ads') : $('.table-view').not('.list-no-ads');
		$firstList = $list.first();
		$lastList = $list.last();

		render(doubleAds);
		if($('.youlanMoreBtn')) {
			$('.hide + .table-adsense-item').addClass('hide')
		}
		function isRealPinned($tags) {
			var isReal = false;
			var classes = ['tag-ace','tag-huoji','tag-ding'];
			$tags.each(function(){
				var tagName = $(this).attr('class').split(/\s+/)[1];
				if (classes.indexOf(tagName) != -1) isReal = true;
			});
			return isReal;
		}
		function render(ads) {
			var index = 1;
			if (showTopItems) {
				if (viewType=='item') {
					for (var i = 2; i > 0; i--) {
						$firstList.prepend(renderAd(ads.shift(),'#item_adsense_top_tmpl'));
					}
				} else {
					$list.prepend(renderAd(ads.shift(),'#'+viewType+'_adsense_tmpl'));
				}
			}

			var regularItems = $lastList.find('.item-regular').get();
			var pinnedItems = $lastList.find('.item-pinned:not(.item-youlan)').get();

			var pinnedItemsSize = 0;
			$(pinnedItems).each(function() {
				var $tags = $(this).find('.tag');
				if (isRealPinned($tags)) pinnedItemsSize++;
			});
			var vipItems = pinnedItems.splice(pinnedItemsSize,pinnedItems.length-pinnedItemsSize);
			regularItems = vipItems.concat(regularItems);
			var $regularItems = $(regularItems);

			var i = 0;
			var insertIndex = 0;
			var insertNum = 2;
			for (; i < ads.length; i++) {
				insertIndex += (i % insertNum)^1;
				if (insertIndex > divide) insertNum = 1;
				if (insertIndex <= divide) {
					var insertPlace = insertSize2 * insertIndex;
				} else {
					var insertPlace = insertSize2 * divide + (insertIndex-divide) * insertSize;
				}
				var content = renderAd(ads[i],'#'+viewType+'_adsense_tmpl');
				var insertNode = $regularItems.eq(insertPlace);

				if (!insertNode.length) break;
				insertNode.before(content);
			};
			// 打点一下展现量
			if(Math.random() < 0.01) {
				window.tracker.evt('search_ad_show', {
					num: $('.clearfix.adsense').length,
					ad1: !!$('#s_i_ad1').length,
					ad3: !!$('#s_i_ad3').length,
					ad5: !!$('#s_i_ad5').length,
				})
			}
						function renderAd(ad, templateHolder) {
				if (!ad) return;
				var template = $(templateHolder).html();
				return $.renderAdsense({
					url: ad.curl,
					line1: ad.tit,
					line2: ad.desc,
					visible_url: ad.surl,
					hintword: ad.bid,
					keyword: keyword,
					billing_name: '30024088_11_cpr',
					index: index++,
					imgUrl: ad.imgUrl || '//file.baixing.net/201508/7e396f2e318dcf731b1d62b615e6b76a.png',
				},template);
			}
		}
	}
	var $cproIdRandom = parseInt(Math.random() * 10000);
	var arrBaiduCproConfig = {};

	arrBaiduCproConfig['n'] = '30024088_11_cpr'; //计费名
	arrBaiduCproConfig['template'] = 'baiduDEFINE';
	arrBaiduCproConfig['wn'] = adSize;   //横向广告条数
	arrBaiduCproConfig['hn'] = 1;   //纵向广告条数
	arrBaiduCproConfig['tm'] = 30;  //标题长度
	arrBaiduCproConfig['cm'] = 40;  //描述长度
	arrBaiduCproConfig['um'] = 28;  //url长度
	arrBaiduCproConfig['define'] = 'cproRenderer';
	arrBaiduCproConfig['charset'] = 'utf8';
	arrBaiduCproConfig['rad'] = 0;  //是否出不相关广告
	arrBaiduCproConfig['uap'] = 0;  //是否出cpa广告
	arrBaiduCproConfig['cad'] = 0;  //是否显示公益广告
	arrBaiduCproConfig['nfr'] = 0;  //是否飘红. 0表示飘红，1表示不飘红。描述不会飘红
	arrBaiduCproConfig['bu'] = 0;   //是否展现show url
	arrBaiduCproConfig['channel'] = '11';   //渠道值
	arrBaiduCproConfig['k'] = '招聘咨询师';
</script>
<script src="//cpro.baidustatic.com/cpro/ui/ui.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="//s.baixing.net/js/module/cookie.81431fea.js"></script>
<script>
/* taq 处理 */
$(document).ready(function () {
	var data = [];
	if (_taq.length) {
		data = _taq;
	}
	_taq = {
		push : function(data) {
			switch (data[0]) {
				case 'evt' :
					var attribute = $.extend({
						"_pvid": tracker.lastPvId
						, "_reid": tracker.reid
						, "_city": tracker.city_name
						, "_category": tracker.category
						, "_ad": tracker.adid
						, "_url": document.location.href.length ? document.location.href.substr(0, 4000) : ''
						, "_bnid": Cookie.read('kjj_trace_banner_id')
						, "_clid": Cookie.read('kjj_trace_click_id_new')
						, "_prof": Cookie.read('kjj_trace_profile_new')
						, "_refer": document.referrer.length ? document.referrer : ''
					}, data[2]);
					$.get('/c/ev/' + encodeURIComponent(data[1]), attribute);
					break;
				case 'ic' :
					$.get( '/c/ic/' + encodeURIComponent(data[1]));
					break;
				case 'count' :
					$.get( '/c/mc/' + encodeURIComponent(data[1]) + '.' + encodeURIComponent(data[2]));
					break;
				case 'timing' :
					$.get('/c/tm/' + encodeURIComponent(data[1]) + '.' + encodeURIComponent(data[2]) +
					'.' + encodeURIComponent(data[3]))
					break;
				case 'klog' :
					$.get( '/c/klog/' + encodeURIComponent(data[1]), data[2]);
					break;
				case 'perf' :
					$.get('/c/perf/' + encodeURIComponent(data[1]), data[2]);
					break;
				case 'manageTrack' :
					$.get('/c/mt/' + encodeURIComponent(data[1]), data[2]);
					break;
			}
		}
	};
	while (data.length) {
		_taq.push(data.shift());
	}
});
</script>
<script>void function(){"use strict";function e(){try{var e=document.write;document.write=function(){};var t=!(document.write===e);return document.write=e,t?1:0}catch(n){return 0}}function t(){return"undefined"!=typeof document.currentScript?1:0}function n(){setTimeout(function(){"function"==typeof WebPerf._logger&&WebPerf._logger(),tracker.evt("test_async_usable",{dw:e(),cs:t(),ua:navigator&&navigator.userAgent||""})},1)}function r(e){var t={T0:WebPerf.t0};WebPerf.vendor&&(t.V=WebPerf.vendor);for(var n in e)if(!a.test(n)&&!t[n]){var r=e[n];switch(typeof r){case"string":r=r.charAt(0);case"number":t[o(n)]=r}}return t}function o(e){var t;switch(t="Start"===e.slice(-5)?0:"End"===e.slice(-3)?1:"",e.split(/[A-Z]/,1)[0]){case"dom":return e.charAt(3)+t;case"connect":return"O"+t;case"response":return"P"+t;case"request":return"Q"+t;case"secure":return"S"+t;case"link":return"N"+t;case"ms":return"P";case"logic":return"G";default:return e.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+t}}if(window.addEventListener)window.addEventListener("load",n,!1);else if(window.attachEvent)window.attachEvent("onload",n);else{var i=window.onload;window.onload=function(e){n(),"function"==typeof i&&i.call(window,e)}}WebPerf.nt=function(){return r(WebPerf.navigationTiming())},WebPerf.setLogger=function(e){this._logger=e};var a=/^(name|entryType|startTime|duration|navigationStart)$/;WebPerf.abbr=o}();
//# sourceMappingURL=2.0d0e2340.js.map</script><script>WebPerf.setLogger(function(){var e=this.nt();tracker.perf(e)});
//# sourceMappingURL=log.e248538a.js.map</script><script class='collector-bar'></script><script type='text/javascript'>
(function() {
	function b64EncodeUnicode(str) {
		return btoa(encodeURIComponent(str).replace(/%([0-9A-F]{2})/g, function(match, p1) {
			return String.fromCharCode('0x' + p1);
		}));
	}

	$('.ex_re').on('click', function(e) {
		var $el = $(e.target)
		var link = $el.attr('href')

		if(!$el.data('url')) $el.data('url', link)

		var extra = { url: $el.data('url'), href: window.location.href }
		var encodeLink = b64EncodeUnicode($.param({url: link, eventType: 'external_redirect', eventValue: extra})).toString()
		var redirectUrl = 'http://www.baixing.com/redirect/index?r=' + encodeLink.replace('+', '-').replace('_', '/').replace('=', ',')

		$el.attr('href', redirectUrl)
	})
})();
</script><script type='text/javascript'>
(function() {
	var clickedAdsense = []

	$('body').on('adsense_click', function(event, data) {
		if(!data || !data.id) return false

		var id = '#' + data.id
		if(clickedAdsense.indexOf(id) === -1) {
			clickedAdsense.push(id)
		} else {
			setTimeout(function() {
				$(id).remove()
			}, 1000)
		}
	})

	// 暂时检测一下搜索广告点击状况，就不取全量了
	if (Math.random() < 0.1) {
		$('body').on('click', '.media.clearfix.adsense', function(e) {
			var offset = $(e.target).parents('.adsense').offset()
			var posY = offset.top - $(window).scrollTop()
			var posX = offset.left - $(window).scrollLeft()

			var result = {
				x: e.screenX - posX,
				y: e.screenY - posY - 120
			}

			tracker.evt('search_ad_click_position', result)
		})
	}
})();
</script>
</body></html>
